db:abstract.db:para: The ObjectPicker class instantiates a component that can be used to interact with an Entity by a process known as picking.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] containsMouse : bool
db:section.db:para: Specifies if the object picker currently contains the mouse

db:section.db:title: [read-only] pressed : bool
db:section.db:para: Specifies if the object picker is currently pressed

db:section.db:title: clicked()
db:section.db:para: This signal is emitted when the bounding volume defined by the pickAttribute property intersects with a ray on a mouse click.

db:section.db:title: entered()
db:section.db:para: This signal is emitted when the bounding volume defined by the pickAttribute property intersects with a ray on the mouse entering the volume.

db:section.db:title: exited()
db:section.db:para: This signal is emitted when the bounding volume defined by the pickAttribute property intersects with a ray on the ray exiting the volume.

db:section.db:title: moved()
db:section.db:para: This signal is emitted when the bounding volume defined by the pickAttribute property intersects with a ray on a mouse move with a button pressed.

db:section.db:title: pressed()
db:section.db:para: This signal is emitted when the bounding volume defined by the pickAttribute property intersects with a ray on a mouse press.

db:section.db:title: released()
db:section.db:para: This signal is emitted when the bounding volume defined by the pickAttribute property intersects with a ray on a mouse release.
